conversations: I want to update my contact info
Sounds good! You can update it here: http://127.0.0.1:8000/update-contact
I want to change my contact info
No problem! You can change it here: http://127.0.0.1:8000/update-contact
Where can I change some information in my contact profile?
You can change that information at this link http://127.0.0.1:8000/update-contact

You can go to this link http://127.0.0.1:8000/update-contact

You can go to this link http://127.0.0.1:8000/update-contact

Congrats on the new phone! You can update it here: http://127.0.0.1:8000/update-contact

Hope your move was a smooth transition! You can update that at this link http://127.0.0.1:8000/update-contact

You can update your address here: http://127.0.0.1:8000/update-contact
